rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with tiled flooring and a small decorative fountain adhering to Vastu principles for prosperity. It includes a built-in storage closet.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living space integrated with the kitchen area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that allow ample natural light and facilitate views of the garden. The design respects Kerala aesthetics by incorporating local motifs.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with seamless integration into the dining area. Equipped with modern appliances and traditional elements like a stone countertop to honor local materials.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated within the living space, offering a transition between kitchen and living area. The space is designed for gatherings with a central dining table that follows Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Featuring a spacious balcony overlooking the front garden, floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light and proper ventilation. The room includes an en-suite bathroom adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with its own balcony for relaxation and air circulation, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu guidelines ensure optimal alignment of the bed.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A functional bedroom with a balcony for fresh air and natural light; floor-to-ceiling windows promote air circulation. Decor aligns with Kerala traditional aesthetics.

rooms.name: Study/Coffice
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace adjacent to the living area, designed for quiet concentration with proper natural lighting and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines for knowledge.

openings.description: A wide entrance door ensuring smooth flow of energy in accordance with Vastu principles.
Large windows that provide abundant natural light and ventilation, enhancing the connection between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Seamless door integration promoting an open-plan flow in line with modern Kerala design aesthetics.
